x = torch.randn(2, 3, 2)
y = torch.randn(2, 4, 2)
z = torch.randn(2, 3, 3)
for matching_type in ['dot', 'mul', 'plus', 'minus', 'concat']:
    Matching(matching_type=matching_type)(x, y)
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    Matching(matching_type='error')
with pytest.raises(RuntimeError):
    Matching()(x, z)
